T03D3816:198a-23: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig

T03D3816:198a-25: rgya cher gsungs pa yin te /

T03D3816:198a-27: mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa gsal bar bstan to //
T03D3816:198a-28: ci ltar ye shes thob pas she na /

T03D3816:198a-30: rigs yongs su 'dzin pa'i ye shes dang /
T03D3816:198a-31: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T03D3816:198a-32: ye shes gang zhig thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T03D3816:198a-33: rigs su skyes pa ni sangs rgyas su rigs nges
T03D3816:198a-35: de ni rigs yongs su 'dzin pa'i ye shes yin la /
T03D3816:198a-36: de thob pas ni lus dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T03D3816:198a-37: 'dis ni gang du tshe rabs mang por mngon par dga' bar byed ba ste /
T03D3816:198a-38: rigs su skyes par gyur ba de ni lus dang ldan par 'gyur te /
T03D3816:198a-39: de'i phyir lus dang ldan pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
T03D3816:198a-40: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang mnyam pa nyid rnam pa lnga nye bar bzung nas te /
T03D3816:198a-41: gnas ngan len mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03D3816:198a-42: bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03D3816:198a-43: spong ba la brtson pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03D3816:198b-0: @198b zang zing med pa'i sems la brtson pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03D3816:198b-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid do //
T03D3816:198b-2: de dag thos pas lus chen por gyur pa ste /
T03D3816:198b-3: sems can thams cad kyi lus nye bar len pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3816:198b-4: de'i lus de ni rang gi ma yin zhing gzhan gyi ma yin la gnas par nus pa'o //
T03D3816:198b-5: des na de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu mi'i lus
T03D3816:198b-6: dang ldan zhing lus chen po zhes gang gsungs pa
T03D3816:198b-7: de de bzhin gshegs pas lus ma mchis par gsungs
T03D3816:198b-8: te des na zhes rgya cher gsungs so //
T03D3816:198b-9: de la lus dang ldan pa dang lus chen pos
T03D3816:198b-10: ni 'dir don dam pa'i tshul rnam par 'jog par
T03D3816:198b-11: byed de / de ltar re zhig ye shes thob pa las so //
T03D3816:198b-12: ci ltar mngon ba'i nga rgyal med pa las she na /
T03D3816:198b-13: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'di skad du zhes rgya cher gang gsungs pa ste /
T03D3816:198b-14: 'dis ci shes par byed ce na /
T03D3816:198b-15: gang zhig 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can rnams
T03D3816:198b-16: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam na
T03D3816:198b-17: byang chub sems dpa' de bdag nyid mngon pa'i nga
T03D3816:198b-18: rgyal can du rig par bya ba ste /
T03D3816:198b-19: yang dag pa'i don du na byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ba'o //
T03D3816:198b-20: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad
T03D3816:198b-21: ni sems can med pa zhes gsungs pas ci zhig
T03D3816:198b-23: gal te sems can yod par gyur na /
T03D3816:198b-24: byang chub sems dpa' de ltar lus dang ldan pa
T03D3816:198b-25: dang lus chen por gyur pa gang las yin zhes
T03D3816:198b-26: pa'o // de las gong du sangs rgyas kyi sa
T03D3816:198b-27: yongs su tshol ba dang zhing rnam par dag pa
T03D3816:198b-28: phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03D3816:198b-29: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'di skad
T03D3816:198b-30: du bdag gis zhing bkod pa rnams bsgrub ba po
T03D3816:198b-31: zhes zer na / de yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
T03D3816:198b-32: de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3816:198b-33: der lta ba dang bcas pa ni yang dag pa'i sgrub pa la 'jug par byed de /
T03D3816:198b-34: des na de spang bar bya ba'i phyir don dam pa rnam par 'jog par byed de /
T03D3816:198b-35: de dag bkod pa med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te /
T03D3816:198b-36: des na zhing bkod pa rnams zhes bya'o zhes so //
T03D3816:198b-37: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'di skad du /
T03D3816:199a-1: pa chos rnams ni bdag med pa'o zhes mos pa
T03D3816:199a-2: zhes pa ni bdag med pa rnam pa gnyis kyi
T03D3816:199a-3: dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ste /
T03D3816:199a-4: gang zag gi bdag med pa dang chos kyi bdag med pa'o //
T03D3816:199a-5: de de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' byang
T03D3816:199a-6: chub sems dpa' zhes brjod do zhes pa ni bdag
T03D3816:199a-7: med pa rnam pa gnyis po de nyid rdzogs par
T03D3816:199a-8: byang chub pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dbang du byas
T03D3816:199a-10: 'dis ci zhig gsal bar byas she na /
T03D3816:199a-11: gang zhig bdag gis bsgrub po zhes gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /
T03D3816:199a-12: zhing bkod pa rnams zhes chos su 'dzin pa ste /
T03D3816:199a-13: de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la med ces pa'o //
T03D3816:199a-14: bla na med pa'i mthong ba dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03D3816:199a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la sha'i spyan mnga' snyam 'am zhes rgya cher gsungs so //
T03D3816:199a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzigs pa rnam par dag
T03D3816:199a-18: pa phul du byung ba mnga' ba nyid du shes
T03D3816:199a-20: shes rab kyi spyan kho na mnga' ba ma yin te /
T03D3816:199a-21: spyan rnam pa lnga mnga' ba nyid gsal bar ston to //
T03D3816:199a-22: gzhan du na shes rab kyi spyan kho nas gzigs pa rnam par dag pa tshol bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3816:199a-23: de la bsdus na spyan rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3816:199a-25: don dam pa'i bden pa 'dzin par byed pa dang //
T03D3816:199a-26: kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'dzin par byed pa dang /
T03D3816:199a-27: rnam pa thams cad du shes bya thams cad 'dzin par byed pa'o //
T03D3816:199a-28: gzugs 'dzin par byed pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3816:199a-31: des na rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro //
T03D3816:199a-32: rgya che ba'i yul can nyid kyi phyir gzugs 'dzin pa ni dang po'o //
T03D3816:199a-33: don dam pa mkhyen pa'i dbang gis kun rdzob la mkhyen pa phyin ci ma log par 'jug ste /
T03D3816:199a-34: de'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa 'dzin pa snga ma'o //
T03D3816:199a-35: de la chos dang gang zag tu mngon par brjod pa ni chos dang gang zag tu btags pa'o //
T03D3816:199a-36: de dag mkhyen pa ni chos kyi spyan zhes brjod par bya ste /
T03D3816:199a-37: 'di ni ji snyed pa gzigs pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T03D3816:199a-38: dper mdzad pa de dag gi bsam pa tha dad
T03D3816:199b-0: pa'i @199b sems kyi rgyun ngas rab tu shes so
T03D3816:199b-1: zhes gang gsungs pa 'di ni ye shes rnam par
T03D3816:199b-2: dag pa ste / de la sems kyi rgyun ni dus gsum pa'i sems rnams so //
T03D3816:199b-3: de la bsam pa tha dad pa ni rnam pa gnyis su rig par bya ste /
T03D3816:199b-4: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'am
T03D3816:199b-5: 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang 'dod chags dang bral
T03D3816:199b-6: ba zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o
T03D3816:199b-7: // yang na 'das pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
T03D3816:199b-8: de ltar gnyis ka yang don dam par rnam par 'jog par byed de /
T03D3816:199b-9: sems kyi rgyun zhes bya ba ni rgyun med ces pa dang /
T03D3816:199b-10: 'das pa'i sems kyang dmigs su med ces bya ba rgya cher gsungs so //
T03D3816:199b-11: de la 'das pa'i sems dmigs su med pa ni nye bar zhi bas so //
T03D3816:199b-12: ma 'ongs pa ni ma byung bas so //
T03D3816:199b-13: da ltar byung ba ni don dam par te /
T03D3816:199b-14: mngon sum gyi shes bya'i dngos po'i dbang du byas nas mthong ba rnam par gzhag pa'o //
T03D3816:199b-15: de nas sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta
T03D3816:199b-16: bar 'doms pa'i dbang du byas pa'i ye shes te
T03D3816:199b-17: / 'dir sems kyi rgyun ni rgyun med pa'o zhes ji skad gsungs pa'o //
T03D3816:199b-18: de bzhin du gzigs pa rnam par dag pa la
T03D3816:199b-19: spyan ni spyan med pa'o zhes ci'i phyir ma gsungs
T03D3816:199b-20: she na / ye shes gzigs pa rnam par dag pa ni rten gcig nyid kyi phyir dang /
T03D3816:199b-21: mthar thug don dam pa rnam par gzhag pa las
T03D3816:199b-22: ni dang po nyid nas grub par 'gyur zhes pa'o
T03D3816:199b-23: // bsod nams kyi phung po dbang du gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /

T03D3816:199b-25: gyi khams 'di zhes rgya cher gsungs pa yin no

T03D3816:199b-28: sku phun sum tshogs pa dang dpe byad kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du byas nas /

T03D3816:199b-31: par blta bar bya snyam ma ma zhes rgya cher

T03D3816:200a-0: mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par blta bar bya @200a * //

T03D3816:200a-16: don gsal bar ston pa ni de rnams nyid snga
T03D3816:200a-17: ma bzhin no // thugs phun sum tshogs pa mngon
T03D3816:200a-18: par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i dbang du mdzad nas

T03D3816:201a-1: ni bsam gtan te gang gi bsam gtan pa de ltar spong ba pa zhes brjod pa ste /

T03D3816:201a-3: de la bsam pas ni de ma yin par bzung la /
